articles.title: William and Kate tweet support for Kyiv in a rare political comment - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a personal tweet signed by the couple, they wrote: 'In October 2020 we had the privilege to meet President Zelenskyy and the First Lady to learn of their hope and optimism for Ukraine's future.'

articles.title: The SIMPSONS release specially commissioned cartoon of family holding Ukraine flags - Daily Mail
articles.description: The show's executive producer Al Jean said the rapid creation of such a politically relevant image did not happen 'very often' but it was important to be 'vigilant about defending freedom'.
articles.content:
